ExternalProject_Add(
	nlopt
	#GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/stevengj/nlopt.git
	#GIT_TAG 2.6.2
	URL https://github.com/stevengj/nlopt/archive/v2.6.2.tar.gz
	#URL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/nlopt-2.6.2.tar.gz
	URL_MD5 0163425f2ad26288391ce8f6a1fc418f
	CMAKE_ARGS
		-DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=${BUILD_SHARED_LIBS}
		-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}
		-DCMAKE_CFG_INTDIR=${CMAKE_CFG_INTDIR}
		-DCMAKE_DEBUG_POSTFIX=d
		-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}
		-DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=${CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH}
		-DCMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_CONFIGURATION=${CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE_CONFIGURATION}
		-DNLOPT_GUILE=OFF
		-DNLOPT_MATLAB=OFF
		-DNLOPT_OCTAVE=OFF
		-DNLOPT_PYTHON=OFF
		-DNLOPT_SWIG=OFF
		-DNLOPT_TESTS=OFF
	INSTALL_DIR ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}
)

ExternalProject_Add_Step(
	nlopt license
	DEPENDEES build
	COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy <SOURCE_DIR>/COPYING ${CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_DATADIR}/nlopt/COPYING
	COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy <SOURCE_DIR>/src/algs/ags/COPYRIGHT ${CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_DATADIR}/nlopt/ags/COPYRIGHT

	COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy <SOURCE_DIR>/src/algs/cobyla/COPYRIGHT ${CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_DATADIR}/nlopt/cobyla/COPYRIGHT
	COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy <SOURCE_DIR>/src/algs/direct/COPYING ${CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_DATADIR}/nlopt/direct/COPYING
	COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy <SOURCE_DIR>/src/algs/esch/COPYRIGHT ${CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_DATADIR}/nlopt/esch/COPYRIGHT
	COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy <SOURCE_DIR>/src/algs/luksan/COPYRIGHT ${CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_DATADIR}/nlopt/luksan/COPYRIGHT
	COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy <SOURCE_DIR>/src/algs/newuoa/COPYRIGHT ${CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_DATADIR}/nlopt/newuoa/COPYRIGHT
	COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy <SOURCE_DIR>/src/algs/slsqp/COPYRIGHT ${CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_DATADIR}/nlopt/slsqp/COPYRIGHT
	COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy <SOURCE_DIR>/src/algs/stogo/COPYRIGHT ${CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_DATADIR}/nlopt/stogo/COPYRIGHT
